name: Late to the Party (Entewickler)
description:
Late to the Party

You are late to the Party of your crush, and you need a nice gift. Your rivals are in the area. Beat them up to steal at least 31 Flowers and go to your crush.

Late To the Party is a Melee FP Maze Runner for the Entewickler-GameJam #01.

In this Game Jam all participants needed to use the same art-pack for the game.
Art-Pack
You could, cut, crop and copy the assets of this art pack but have to use it for your game art, excluding UI and Menus.

Other used Assets 
(SFX Sounds, Menu) are from Kenney.nl
Music from Section 31 -Tech 

The Leaderboard is created and used via https://silentwolf.com/
